name: good-rod
effect: Used to find Pokémon on the Good Rod list for an area, which are generally mediocre.
short_effect: Used to catch Pokémon in bodies of water.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A new, good-quality fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.
flavor_text.platinum: A new, good-quality fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A new, good-quality fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.
